text: Richard Stephen Wilkins (born 19 June 1954) is a New Zealand-Australian television and radio presenter. He is the Entertainment Editor for the Nine Network, co-host of Weekend Today and weekend announcer on smoothfm, and Master of Ceremonies. In March 2020, he was diagnosed with COVID-19. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Australian television presenters Category:People from Auckland
title: Richard Wilkins (TV presenter)
